scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name WhisperGptDev --template-body file://template.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters file://parameters.json
scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name WhisperGptDev --template-body file://template.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters file://parameters.json
